data.name: firstNews1st
data.value: Górnik will face the Moldovan Zaria Balti. The host of the first match will be Zaria, who took the fifth place in the Moldavian first league. She got into the cups after retiring from the competition Dacia Kishinev.

data.name: firstNews2nd
data.value: Lech will play with Gandżasar Kapan from Armenia. The first match will take place on July 12 in Poznan in the empty stands (this is a penalty during the match of the last round of Lech - Legia Warsaw). Revision July 19.

data.name: firstNews3rd
data.value: In the previous season, Gandzasar finished third in the Armenian Premier League and won the national cup.

data.name: firstNews4th
data.value: The draw of the second round - then Jagiellonia Białystok, the runner-up of Poland, will enter the game - it will take place on Wednesday at 2:00 PM.

data.name: secondNews1st
data.value: On May 15, the government approved changes in family benefits. It will grow, among others income criterion entitling to social assistance. The increase was forced by the protest of the guardians of people with disabilities in the Sejm.

data.name: secondNews2nd
data.value: The Council of Ministers accepted the proposal to change the amount of income criteria and amounts of benefits contained in the Act of 28 November 2003 on family benefits. As a result, more people will have a chance to receive benefits.

data.name: secondNews3rd
data.value: From 1 November 2018, some family benefits for disabled persons or their carers will increase. Care allowance will amount to PLN 184.42 (increase by PLN 31.42). Another raise of this allowance - up to PLN 215.84, will take effect from November 1, 2019. Special care allowance will be PLN 620 (increase by PLN 100). Guardian's allowance will increase to PLN 620 (by PLN 100).

data.name: thirdNews1st
data.value: The gas pipeline will run through Danish, Swedish and Polish waters. It will have 275 km.

data.name: thirdNews2nd
data.value: Gaz-System, responsible for the construction of the Baltic Pipe undersea pipeline, announced the selection of the preferred route for this investment.

data.name: thirdNews3rd
data.value: The route will be run through Danish and Polish sea areas and the Swedish exclusive economic zone. Its length will be about 275 km. Earlier, Gaz-System reported that he was also considering German waters.

data.name: thirdNews4th
data.value: The starting point for the gas pipeline to land is Faxe South in Denmark (also considered Faxe North, in the same Faxe Bay) and Niechorze-Pogorzelica in Poland (also considered Rogowo and Gąski, located eastwards).
